name: Worms Forts 3D
storyline: Aggressive Worms cannot creep easily when the enemy freely breathes one air with them: being in a fortress, they construct a powerful system of defence, develop weapons of mass destruction to finish the enemy once and for all! But Worms need a military leader! Do not wish to head group of several Worms and together with them to reach the victorious end? A few military wisdom and strategy, the small help of a catapult or a gun, and some afflicted and straining to be in action Worms - with such a set the victory is almost in your hands!
summary: A turn-based artillery game for mobile phones.
